title: BTS, the K-Pop Band, Dives into NFTs to Sell Digital Trading Cards to Fans
sub_head: Hybe, the entertainment company that manages BTS, says the tradable digital cards will play music
body:
BTS is getting into NFTs.
The boy-band sensation from South Korea is planning to sell digital cards of its band members that can be collected or traded, similar to the limited-edition physical photo cards fans already hoard. But the digital cards will move when tapped on and play music or show the bandmates talking.
